content: {"name": "Capuchin Services Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Appointment must be made 1 day in advance before picking up food.", "email": "", "url": "http://cskdetroit.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6333 Medbury Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Detroit", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48211", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3780448, "longitude": -83.0318128}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 925-1370", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:50", "closes_at": "18:50"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:50", "closes_at": "18:50"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:50", "closes_at": "18:50"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:50", "closes_at": "18:50"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:50", "closes_at": "18:50"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
